sentence.Network_en: His dumbness means that he isn't interest in this kind of things.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的沉默表明他对这种事情不感兴趣.

sentence.Network_en: In particular, the dumbness would appear to be aggravated by stress.
sentence.Network_cn: 特别是, 压力会让沉默变得更为严重.

sentence.Network_en: We regard her dumbness as the acknowledgment.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们把她的沉默看作是同意.

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being mentally slow and limited

auth_sentence.content: To overlook this is more dumbness in itself. There have always been women geniuses.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: To overlook this is more dumbness in itself. There have always been women geniuses.

auth_sentence.content: But when the last power chord dies away you feel yourself grinning at the sheer unrepentant dumbness of it all.
